attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new rules must be implemented this year to ensure that the public know that you mean business. It will not take 5 years to sort out the fiddlers in the House, if you do let it go then you are as bad as the rest of them

rejection.details: Your main sentence 'start rules Now' needs to be a clearer.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
